original_text: Do not listen to the words of an adulteress. She promises something as sweet as honey and as beautiful as olive oil.
korean_text: 대저 음녀의 입술은 꿀을 떨어뜨리며 그의 입은 기름보다 미끄러우나

sentences.original_text: Do not listen to the words of an adulteress.
She promises something as sweet as honey
and as beautiful as olive oil.
